text: Nikolaos Triantafyllopoulos (10 January 1918 - 1998) was a Greek sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre rifle, three positions and 50 metre rifle, prone events at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:1998 deaths Category:Greek male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Greece Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Messenia
title: Nikolaos Triantafyllopoulos
